title: House Seeks Say Over AI Chip Sales After Nvidia’s China Win
description: Congress is one step closer to gaining the authority to review artificial intelligence chip sales to China, a move likely to open a rift with the Trump administration over plans to let Nvidia Corp. sell its powerful H200 processors to the world’s second-largest economy.

title: Cory Doctorow on seizing the means on computation
description: Barry speaks with Cory Doctorow, a science fiction author, activist, journalist and blogger. They discuss the power of large companies over the Internet, and Corey's advocacy for data privacy. Barry and Cory discuss platform decay on the Internet, and how companies keep operating profitably while the user experience decays. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Anthropic’s Revenue Run Rate Tops $9 Billion as VCs Pile In
description: Iconiq, Lightspeed and Menlo Ventures are set to join the startup’s new funding round at a $350 billion valuation.
